turns.text: Okay what kind of dinner parties have you had

And uh you put that in and then you get some real sharp cheddar cheese --

Its making me hungry for them --

And uh with spices and things in them
But never anything mixed with Bisquick
I Ive used that quite bit and it and it seems to work real well

Put some fresh little fresh shrimp and its in your macaroni salad that you make
